price: ከአላህም በኾነ ጸጋና ችሮታ ክፉ ነገር ያልነካቸው ኾነው ተመለሱ፡፡ የአላህንም ውዴታ ተከተሉ፤ አላህም የታላቅ ችሮታ ባለቤት ነው፡፡
arabic: فَٱنقَلَبُواْ بِنِعۡمَةٖ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَفَضۡلٖ لَّمۡ يَمۡسَسۡهُمۡ سُوٓءٞ وَٱتَّبَعُواْ رِضۡوَٰنَ ٱللَّهِۗ وَٱللَّهُ ذُو فَضۡلٍ عَظِيمٍ

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: fa-inqalabū biniʿ'matin mina al-lahi wafaḍlin lam yamsashum sūon wa-ittabaʿū riḍ'wāna al-lahi wal-lahu dhū faḍlin ʿaẓīmin
